shortdesc.i: Retrieves the contact with specified contactId. This function is especially useful if you have previously obtained an contact object, and you want to get a fresh copy from the backend to make sure all its properties are up-to-date.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

    var contacts = blackberry.pim.contacts;

    function getContactById(contactId) {
        var contact = contacts.getContact(contactId);
        if (contact) {
            alert("Contact id #" + contactId + " corresponds to '" + contact.name.givenName + " " + contact.name.familyName +"'.");
        } else {
            alert("There is no contact with id: " + contactId);
        }
    }

</script>
